import React, { Component, Fragment } from 'react' import FooterDesktop from '../components/common/FooterDesktop' import FooterMobile from '../components/common/FooterMobile' import NavMenuDesktop from '../components/common/NavMenuDesktop' import NavMenuMobile from '../components/common/NavMenuMobile' import Profile from '../components/common/Profile' class ProfilePage extends Component { componentDidMount(){ window.scroll(0,0) } render() { const User = this.props.user; return (
) } } export default ProfilePage
